references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a foundational vision-language model used in several key methods evaluated in the main study.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: Qwen-VL is another significant vision-language model that is referenced and compared against.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: PaliGemma is a prominent vision-language model used by one of the compared methods in this work.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces a fundamental dense passage retrieval method which is used as a baseline in the study.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: The ColBERT method is another important baseline retrieval method compared in the experiments.
